description: The Austin Hospital, Heidelberg, Victoria. Details services provides by this large, modern hospital employing in addition to medical staff an army of engineers, gardeners, painters, kitchen, laundry and office staff and business experts. The hospital has a nursing training course, modern nurses home with many amenities, library, physiotherapy and occupational therapy departments and large children's block.
